allow: Bash(if not exist package.json npm init -y)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\14\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d rostracore_db -c "SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM shifts WHERE start_time >= ''2025-11-05'' AND start_time < ''2025-11-13'' GROUP BY status;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\14\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d rostracore_db -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''organizations'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\14\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d rostracore_db -c "SELECT username, role_name, is_active FROM users LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\14\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d rostracore_db -c "SELECT column_name, data_type, udt_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''users'' AND column_name = ''role'';")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\14\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d rostracore_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as user_count FROM users;")
